name: Counter Economic Warfare Methods
description: Strategies to identify, counteract, and disrupt economic manipulation tactics used by elite global entities.

cards.title: Identifying Economic Sanctions as Warfare Tools
cards.description: How financial sanctions and trade restrictions are used as geopolitical weapons.
bulletpoints: Examining historical cases where sanctions were used to destabilize nations.
Understanding how financial restrictions create economic bottlenecks.
Tracking the economic consequences of targeted financial isolation.
cards.summaryText: Parse sanction case studies, map imposed bottlenecks, and chart the fallout of financial isolation.

cards.title: Stock Market and Currency Manipulation
cards.description: Understanding how financial institutions and hedge funds manipulate markets.
bulletpoints: Exposing high-frequency trading (HFT) and algorithmic manipulation.
Analyzing historical cases of market crashes engineered by financial elites.
Identifying economic hitmen tactics used to destabilize economies.
cards.summaryText: Expose HFT manipulation, audit engineered crashes, and document economic hitman tactics.

cards.title: Crypto Warfare and Decentralized Financial Tactics
cards.description: Understanding how blockchain technology is both a threat and a tool against economic manipulation.
bulletpoints: Examining the role of central bank digital currencies (CBDCs) in financial control.
Tracking the use of cryptocurrencies in money laundering and financial resistance.
Developing decentralized economic structures to counteract elite financial dominance.
cards.summaryText: Evaluate CBDC control plays, monitor crypto warfare, and architect decentralized counter-economies.
